20101226175835.000|20101226175837.000|TR0|project on Capitol Hill near the house 
20101226175837.000|20101226175839.000|TR0|that I live in with George Miller and 
20101226175839.000|20101226175841.000|TR0|Chuck Schumer.  And we were inundated by 
20101226175841.000|20101226175843.000|TR0|rats.  I mean it.  We bought these big rat 
20101226175843.000|20101226175845.000|TR0|traps, and my two stalwart roommates from 
20101226175845.000|20101226175848.000|TR0|California and New York wouldn't touch 
20101226175848.000|20101226175850.000|TR0|them.       I hate rats.  I ran into them 
20101226175850.000|20101226175852.000|TR0|when I used to work in a slaughterhouse 
20101226175852.000|20101226175854.000|TR0|back in the stockyards and I'd set the 
20101226175854.000|20101226175856.000|TR0|traps and my roommates would stand by, 
20101226175856.000|20101226175858.000|TR0|waiting, and unfortunately it turned out 
20101226175858.000|20101226175900.000|TR0|to be my job but it was a successful job.
20101226175900.000|20101226175903.000|TR0|
